title: Danny DeVito | Amber Says What: FBI Raids Trump's Mar-a-Lago, Dolly Parton Dog Wigs and Quiet Quitting
description:
Late Night writer Amber Ruffin recaps what's happening in pop culture news.

Then, Danny DeVito talks about playing the devil opposite his two kids and Aubrey Plaza in Little Demon, working with his daughter on stage and all his children going into show business.
